name: MaterialApp
desc: An application that uses Material Design.

fields.name: scaffoldMessengerKey
fields.desc: A key to use when building the [ScaffoldMessenger].

fields.name: theme
fields.desc: Default visual properties, like colors fonts and shapes, for this app's material widgets.

fields.name: darkTheme
fields.desc: The [ThemeData] to use when a 'dark mode' is requested by the system.

fields.name: highContrastTheme
fields.desc: The [ThemeData] to use when 'high contrast' is requested by the system.

fields.name: highContrastDarkTheme
fields.desc: The [ThemeData] to use when a 'dark mode' and 'high contrast' is requested by the system.

fields.name: themeMode
fields.desc: Determines which theme will be used by the application if both [theme] and [darkTheme] are provided.

fields.name: themeAnimationDuration
fields.desc: The duration of animated theme changes.

fields.name: themeAnimationCurve
fields.desc: The curve to apply when animating theme changes.

fields.name: checkerboardRasterCacheImages
fields.desc: Turns on checkerboarding of raster cache images.

fields.name: checkerboardOffscreenLayers
fields.desc: Turns on checkerboarding of layers rendered to offscreen bitmaps.

fields.name: showSemanticsDebugger
fields.desc: Turns on an overlay that shows the accessibility information reported by the framework.

fields.name: shortcuts
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.widgetsApp.shortcuts} {@tool snippet} This example shows how to add a single shortcut for [LogicalKeyboardKey.select] to the default shortcuts without needing to add your own [Shortcuts] widget.

fields.name: actions
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.widgetsApp.actions} {@tool snippet} This example shows how to add a single action handling an [ActivateAction] to the default actions without needing to add your own [Actions] widget.

fields.name: debugShowMaterialGrid
fields.desc: Turns on a [GridPaper] overlay that paints a baseline grid Material apps.

fields.name: themeAnimationStyle
fields.desc: Used to override the theme animation curve and duration.
